0.name: Fleetwinged Raid
0.fullDesc:
Marks a designated single enemy target as "Prey" and deals to it Lightning DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of Moze's ATK, and gains {{2}} points of Charge.
When there are no other characters on the field that are capable of combat, Moze cannot use his Skill and dispels the enemy's "Prey" state.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Marks one enemy as "Prey"</orangeStrong> and deals Lightning DMG to it. Gains <orangeStrong>{{2}}</orangeStrong> points of Charge.

0.name: Dash In, Gash Out
0.fullDesc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Moze's ATK to a single target enemy, and launches the Talent's Follow-up ATK against this target. If the target is defeated before this Follow-up ATK is used, then launches the Follow-up ATK against a random single enemy instead.
0.shortDesc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single enemy, and launches Talent's <orangeStrong>Follow-up ATK</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Cascading Featherblade
0.fullDesc:
When "Prey" exists on the field, Moze will enter the Departed state.
After allies attack "Prey," Moze will additionally deal 1 instance of Lightning Additional DMG equal to {{1, percent}}% of his ATK and consumes 1 point of Charge. For every {{2}} point(s) of Charge consumed, Moze launches 1 Follow-up ATK to "Prey," dealing Lightning DMG equal to {{3, percent}}% of his ATK. When Charge reaches 0, dispels the target's "Prey" state and resets the tally of Charge points required to launch Follow-up ATK. Talent's Follow-up ATK does not consume Charge.
0.shortDesc:
When "Prey" exists on the field, Moze will enter the Departed state.
After allies attack "Prey," Moze deals Lightning Additional DMG and consumes 1 Charge point. For every {{2}} point(s) of Charge consumed, Moze launches Follow-up ATK on "Prey," dealing Lightning DMG. When Charge is 0, dispels the target's "Prey" state.

0.name: Bated Wings
0.fullDesc: After using Technique, enters the Stealth state for {{1}} second(s). While in Stealth, Moze is undetectable by enemies. If Moze attacks enemies to enter combat while in Stealth, increases DMG by {{2, percent}}%, lasting for {{3}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Enters the Stealth state. Attacking enemies to enter combat while in Stealth increases DMG.
